name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @mranti My comments section has evolved. They will block me first, then every time I post, they will unblock me, leave a comment, and then block me again. This way I can't see them, so I can't block them, but all readers can see them. Only when readers scold them can I see a blocked comment, and then click in to block them. This is also a weird mechanism.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
Under a piece of news that "Taiwan rejected the application of officials from nine provinces in mainland China to attend the Taiwan Travel Fair", 20,000 netizens gave a thumbs up to express their support

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Breaking News: Russian General Sergei Surovikin arrested for involvement in Wagner rebellion, The Moscow Times reports

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @mranti There is another problem, which may be a bug in Twitter. Although I hide and block some comments, they are still in the comment area when I see them from my secondary account. So...I am also very sorry, but this is probably not a situation that I can solve as a user.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, Liuyang City began to deduct the bonuses of low-professional teachers
Required low-professional teachers to return the bonuses they received in 2021-2022. Many teachers were deducted more than 6,000 yuan, but the salaries of leaders and older teachers increased significantly.

In the early morning of June 29, residents of Shenhai Forest Community in Zigong, Sichuan Province, took to the streets due to a power outage
According to the contributor, in order to save money, the community property did not install the fire-fighting equipment required by the government, which resulted in a power outage.

On June 29, Xinhua News Agency released the news that "one in seven British people didn't have enough to eat last year"
It caused ridicule from netizens.
One netizen lamented, "My brain is blank, I really can't wash it anymore!"

The Tencent WeChat team then issued an apology.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Beware of being deceived!
Recently, a large number of fake pornographic promotions have occupied the Twitter comment area
Some netizens tested and added the telegram provided by the fake pornographic promotion. The other party asked to install an app on the grounds of viewing the photo album. The application registration requires a domestic mobile phone number and address book permissions, location permissions, and photo album permissions. If you do not give permissions, you cannot use it.
Since the mobile phone number is real-name, the APP may have the risk of collecting the address book, photo album, and geographic location of the real-name user.
Remind again, beware of being deceived!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At 6:30 pm on June 29, the forced demolition site in Fenzhuang Village, Fangshan District, Beijing.
The video shows that the local authorities hired a group of young people to surround the victim and prevent him from approaching.
The victim could only watch the home he had lived in for 30 years being demolished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens added that this routine may also be a very common blackmail routine
